articles.title: Banquet Hosted by Zimbabwean VP in Honor of Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Banquet Hosted by Zimbabwean VP in Honor of Kim Yong Nam
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Vice-President of Zimbabwe Joyce Teurai Ropa Mujuru hosted a banquet on May 12 in honor of Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on a visit to Zimbabwe.
					 Present there on invitation were Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK Ambassador to Zimbabwe An Hui Jong and other suite members.
					
					 Present there were ministers including Foreign Minister Simbarashe Mumbengegwi, commanders of the army, the mayor of Harare and officials concerned. 
					
					 The banquet proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Wreath Laid at Cemetery of Heroes
articles.content:
Wreath Laid at Cemetery of Heroes
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on a visit to Zimbabwe laid a wreath at the Cemetery of Heroes on May 12.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK Ambassador to Zimbabwe An Hui Jong and other suite members and Zimbabwean Foreign Minister Simbarashe Mumbengegwi and other officials concerned.
					
					 Kim and his party went round the cemetery after paying a silent tribute to the memory of the Zimbabwean martyrs who fell in the armed struggle to oppose the imperialist domination and achieve the independence of the country.

articles.title: Inter-Sector Talks between DPRK and Zimbabwe Held
articles.content:
Inter-Sector Talks between DPRK and Zimbabwe Held
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Inter-sector talks between the DPRK and Zimbabwe took place in Harare on May 11 and 12. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam and Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and from the Zimbabwean side Minister of Agriculture Mechanization and Irrigation Development Joseph Mtekwese Made, Minister of Energy and Power Development Elias Mudzuri, Minister of Mines and Mining Development Obert Moses Mpofu and Minister of Industry and Commerce Welshman Ncube and Foreign Minister Simbarashe Mumbengegwi.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the favorably developing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and matters of bilateral concern.

articles.title: Talks between FMs of DPRK and Brazil Held
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Brazil Held
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Talks between Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun who is heading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Brazil and Brazilian Foreign Minister Celso Luis Nunes Amorim were held in Brasilia on May 11.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Brazil and from the Brazilian side the undersecretary general of the Foreign Ministry and officials concerned.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in various fields and matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Myanmar Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Myanmar Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar headed by Vice-Minister U Maung Myint at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of Myanmar Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of Myanmar Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the head of the visiting delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar.
					 It was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday by U Maung Myint, deputy foreign minister who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China National Textile and Apparel Council headed by Vice-President Wang Tiankai arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Reception Given on "Day of Wing of China" at Intl' Trade Fair
articles.content:
Reception Given on "Day of Wing of China" at Intl' Trade Fair
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Wang Jinzhen, vice-chairman of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade and the China Chamber of International Commerce, co-hosted a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday on the occasion of the "Day of Wing of China" at the 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.
					 Present there on invitation were O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and other trade officials and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand there were the delegation of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade and the China Chamber of International Commerce participating in the trade fair and other Chinese guests and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception. 
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that the DPRK-China friendly relations are growing stronger under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries, expressing their will to consolidate and expand the relations of economic cooperation between the DPRK and China in this significant "year of DPRK-China friendship."

articles.title: Agricultural Researches Brisk
articles.content:
Agricultural Researches Brisk
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Agricultural Science of the DPRK has of late reported a lot of scientific and technological successes.
					 Ri Je Ok, a room chief of the Plant Protection Institute, told about a successful test for increasing the effect of extermination of harmful insects by their natural enemies and its application.
					
					 The institute achieved sizable results last year by introducing a new method of exterminating harmful insects.
					
					With the expansion of the research results, it is planning to lift this domain to the advanced level in the future, while intensifying international exchange and cooperation.
					
					 The academy has also made a big stride in researches for improving the method of hydroponic production of pure seed potato.
					
					 Full-scale researches have been made to establish a system of seed potato production mainly by hydroponic cultivation on a more solid foundation and expand it on seed farms, and a cultivation base large in scale has been created in this course.
					
					 Successes have also been made in other researches into seed potato production.
					
					 And new agrochemicals, which are highly effective in the extermination of harmful insects, while friendly to ecological environment ,and convenient for carriage, storage and use, have been developed and put into trial production.

articles.title: Former Unconverted Long-Term Prisoner Dies
articles.content:
Former Unconverted Long-Term Prisoner Dies
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Former unconverted long-term prisoner Han Paek Ryol died of an incurable disease at the age of 89 on May 12.
					 The obituary of him was published on Wednesday.
					
					 According to it, he, born into a poor peasant's family in Songnam City, Kyonggi Province, on February 16, Juche 9 (1920), took part in the anti-Japanese patriotic struggle.
					
					 He waged a positive struggle against the U.S. imperialists who occupied south Korea and their stooges after the liberation of Korea.  During the Fatherland Liberation War he energetically encouraged soldiers and people in the struggle to win victory in the war through the distribution of publications.
					
					 He was arrested by the enemy while struggling to implement President Kim Il Sung's idea of achieving national reunification in the post-war period. He remained true to his firm revolutionary faith and principle as a member of the Workers' Party of Korea for 23 years behind bars. He did not stop his struggle even after his release.
					
					 He was awarded the title of Hero of the DPRK and the National Reunification Prize as a pro-reunification patriotic fighter after coming into the care of the DPRK. He dedicated his all to the building of a thriving nation and the national reunification till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 The feats performed by him in the struggle for the reunification of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche will last long, said the obituary.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Call for Going Nuclear Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Call for Going Nuclear Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Former Japanese Minister of Finance Nakagawa, addressing a recent Diet session, claimed Japan, too, should have access to nuclear weapons, while talking about someone's nukes. Former Japanese Prime Minister Abe jabbered in a lecture that it is necessary to approach the election of the House of Representatives with the LDP's election pledge containing a changed interpretation of the Constitution including the "right to collective self-defense" and "Japan would become safer if it would be capable of intercepting north Korea's ballistic missile" on the basis of changed interpretation of the Constitution. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a signed commentary denounces this as a move to achieve their sinister political aim under the pretext of someone's "threat."
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have long pursued their ambitious policy of nuclear development to go nuclear. As a result, Japan has not only fully acquired the method of making nukes but laid all the material and technological foundations for the manufacture of nuclear weapons.
					
					 They have stepped up such moves in a bid to realize their militarist ambition for overseas aggression both in name and reality. Japan's present call for "having access to nukes" is aimed to achieve the same objective. 
					
					 To this end they are making desperate efforts to retrogressively revise at any cost Article 9 of the "Pacifist Constitution" which binds them hand and foot and leaving no stone unturned to make Japan a warring state.
					
					 Japan's scenario to go nuclear and exercise the "right to collective self-defense" will not escape the international community's strong protest and denunciation as it is a criminal act of gravely threatening global peace and security.
					
					 For Japan to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" with nuclear weapons is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with fagot on its back. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better stop at once their reckless act of throwing the destiny of the country and its people into an abyss of destruction.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Overseas Expansion Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Overseas Expansion Flayed
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Maritime "Self-Defence Force" (MSDF) and the National Safety Agency (NSA) of Japan were recently reported to have staged a combined drill in the waters off Haneda, Tokyo with huge armed forces involved. Prime Minister Aso, addressing a ceremony of reviewing the troops involved in the drill, urged the MSDF and the NSA to faithfully perform their duties in order to make the waters off Japan a "safe and peaceful sea."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The combined drill is a product of the U.S. imperialists' Asian strategy for aggression and part of the moves to realize Japan's ambition for overseas expansion by invading Korea, pursuant to the U.S. war strategy, and paving the way for staging a comeback to Asia with its peninsula as a springboard.
					
					 The fact that a large portion of the period of the combined drill was devoted to the task force maneuvers of the MSDF goes to clearly prove its offensive nature and criminal purpose.
					
					 Japan stands isolated and rejected in the international arena and in the grip of political and economic crisis at present. It is an anachronistic daydream for Japan to dare threaten, blackmail and hurt someone.
					
					 It is an invariable stand of the DPRK to counter the theory of "a preemptive attack" touted by the Japanese reactionaries with a fiercer Korean-style preemptive attack as already clarified before the world.
					
					 Japan' s moves to ignite a reckless war against the DPRK while talking about "a preemptive attack" and the like will be as foolish an act as jumping into fire with fagot on its back.

articles.title: S. Korean Minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade's" Treacherous Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade's" Treacherous Remarks Slammed
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Ryu Myong Hwan, minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" of the Lee Myung Bak "government", recently kicked up confrontation hysteria, terming the brigandish decision made by the UNSC to "tighten sanctions" against the DPRK a "great success."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What this traitor uttered is an unpardonable challenge to the DPRK which has worked hard to protect the national sovereignty, preserve the country's peace and achieve reunification. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations had favorably developed since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration but have reached a grave phase of total collapse at present. This is entirely attributable to the Lee regime's policy of sycophancy and treachery.
					
					 Ryu Myong Hwan is the top-class traitor as he has taken the lead in conducting traitor Lee Myung Bak's criminal "diplomacy" veiled with the word of "pragmatism" as a strong advocator of it. 
					
					 The commentary lays bare Ryu's rare disposition as a sycophant and traitor bereft of even an iota of the consciousness of being a member of the Korean nation and its soul.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As long as such stupid guy as Ryu keen on racket of confrontation with fellow countrymen in utter disregard of the nation's destiny, backed by outsiders, is allowed to go on reckless as now, it is quite impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations nor is it possible to avoid a nuclear war, much less achieving peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Ryu had better behave himself, mindful that his hysteric call for confrontation is as foolish an act as precipitating his own destruction.

articles.title: Adherence to Principle of National Independence Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Principle of National Independence Called for
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- It is the fundamental guarantee for successfully realizing the cause of national reunification in keeping with the interests and requirement of the Korean nation to thoroughly apply the principle of national independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 Noting that the reunification of Korea is for the Korean nation from A to Z and the Korean nation itself is responsible for the reunification, the article says:
					
					 Flunkeyism and dependence on foreign forces lead to national destruction and division, and national independence only is the key to achieving reunification. This is the lesson taught by the long history of national division.
					
					 The major forces obstructing the reunification of Korea are the U.S. and Japanese aggression forces and the sycophantic traitors of south Korea following them.
					
					 The United States has been hell-bent on carrying out the policy of military occupation of south Korea and the hostile policy toward the DPRK, out of its invariable design to dominate Asia and the rest of the world with south Korea as a springboard. The Japanese reactionaries have persistently hindered the reunification of Korea while zealously following the U.S hostile policy toward the DPRK in a bid to turn Japan into the leader of Asia and realize its old dream of "Greater east Asia co-prosperity sphere" with the help of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea is getting frantic in the sycophantic and treacherous deeds and anti-DPRK war moves to realize its wild design for "unification through invasion of the north" in league with its U.S. and Japanese masters.
					
					 The reality urgently calls upon all the Koreans to decisively frustrate the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad through their nationwide struggle and open up the road for the national independent reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation's struggle for reunification of the country is, in essence, the acute confrontation between the forces for national independence and the foreign forces for aggression and between the patriotic forces for reunification and the traitorous forces against reunification.
					
					 Reunification represents patriotism and division means treachery, and the independent reunification is the only way out for the Korean nation.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should continue the powerful grand march for independent reunification, holding high the banner of national independence under the leadership of Kim Jong Il until the day when their long cherished desire for national reunification is realized, the article concludes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Urged to Stop Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Urged to Stop Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Buddhist Peace Solidarity of south Korea on May 10 issued a statement in denunciation of the puppet group's suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 The statement held that since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime the inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation have been suspended and the south-north relations bedeviled,
					
					 It is against this background that the Lee regime is hell bent on the suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon which has worked hard for national reunification, the statement noted, adding that this is an act of denying national cooperation and threatening peace.
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak has never let a chance pass by without uttering he would recover the economy, but it is impossible to recover the economy and achieve peace in this land unless the south-north relations are improved. 
					
					 The Buddhists, too, desire peace and dialogue between the south and the north and actively turn out in the reunification movement. The Lee regime should stop its suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon under the pretext of security and release those who were arrested.
					
					 The statement demanded Lee Myung Bak drop the anti-reunification policy of confrontation and turn out in the actions for the independence and reunification of the nation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Organizations Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Organizations Assailed
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "Lee Myung Bak group should immediately stop the brutal suppression of all the pro-reunification patriotic organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon)" on May 9.
					 The statement said that the Lee Myung Bak group which labeled the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations and the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration "enemy-benefiting organizations" kicked off a frantic campaign of arrest against pro-reunification movement organizations again this time. By doing so, it once again fully disclosed its sinister intention to arrest the south Korean people's struggle for democracy and totally eliminate pro-reunification patriotic forces, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The group of traitors' wholesale suppression of the organization is a despicable, treacherous and anti-reunification action as it is designed to desperately hamstring the implementation of the north-south joint declaration desired by the entire nation. 
					
					 The U.S. Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon in a statement on May 8 denounced the Lee group for perpetrating a massive search operation against the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and arresting the chairman of the organization and its leading members on charges of violation of the "National Security Law" on May 7.
					
					 The Lee group is incriminating the actions for the country's reunification and cracking down upon them as it is totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and steeped in the idea of sycophancy and submission in a desperate bid to stay in power, it noted, demanding the Lee "government" immediately release all the arrested people including members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, lend an ear to the voices of the people and the history and opt for implementing the above-said declarations.

articles.title: Vicepresidente zimbabweyano ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Vicepresidente zimbabweyano ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam
  Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ATCC) -- El vicepresidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, Joyce Teurai Ropa Mujuru, ofrecio la vispera un banquete en honor del presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien realiza una visita a este pais africano.
					  A la ocasion fueron invitados tambien el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el embajador coreano en ese pais An Hui Jong y otros acompanantes.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes el canciller zimbabweyano Simbarashe Mumbengegi y otros ministros, los comandantes del ejercito, el alcalde de Harare y otros interesados. 
					
					 La recepcion transcurrio en un clima amistoso.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam deposita ofrenda floral ante Cementerio de Heroes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam deposita ofrenda floral ante Cementerio de Heroes
  Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien realiza una visita a la Republica de Zimbabwe, deposito el dia 12 una ofrenda floral ante el Cementerio de los Heroes.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el embajador coreano en este pais africano An Hui Jong y otros acompanantes coreanos, el canciller Simbarashe Mumbengegi y otros interesados de Zimbabwe.
					
					  Kim y su comitiva guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires zimbabweyanos quienes se dedicaron a la lucha armada contra el dominio del imperialismo y por la independencia del pais y recorrieron el Cementerio.

articles.title: Conversaciones por sectores entre Corea y Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Conversaciones por sectores entre Corea y Zimbabwe
  Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 11 y 12 en Harare las conversaciones por sectores entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Zimbabwe.
					  En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam y el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, por la parte coreana y por la zimbabweyana, el ministro de Mecanizacion de Agricultura y Desarrollo de Irrigacion Joseph Mtekwese Made,  el del Desarrollo de Fuerza y Energia  Elias Mudzuri, el de Desarrollo de Mineria y Mina Obert Moses Mpofu, el ministro de Industria y Comercio Welshman Ncube, y el canciller Simbarashe Mumbengegwi.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises que se desarrollan favorablemente y sobre otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Banquete motivado por el "Dia de pabellon de China"
articles.content:
Banquete motivado por el "Dia de pabellon de China"
  Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ATCC) -- El embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming, y el vicepresidente del Consejo Chino para el Fomento del Comercio Internacional y de la Camara China de Comercio Internacional, Wang Jinzhen, ofrecieron la vispera en el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang el banquete con motivo del "Dia del Pabellon de China" de la 12 Exposicion de Mercancias primaveral de Pyongyang.
					  A la recepcion fueron invitados el viceministro coreano de Comercio Exterior O Ryong Chol y otros funcionarios de esta rama, asi como los correspondientes.
					
					  Ademas, estuvieron presentes los miembros de las delegaciones de dicho Consejo y Camara y otros huespedes chinos y los miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					  En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					  Los oradores se refirieron a que bajo la gran atencion de los maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises  se fortalecen las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y expresaron sus determinaciones de consolidar las relaciones de cooperacion economica entre estos dos paises en 2009, "Ano de amistad Corea-China".
